item.description:
Merry Christmas everyone. Come one, come all, come bearing gifts, if you choose, to this years holiday Yankee swap gathering. There will be merriment galore as we play games*, sing carols and enjoy each others company. So make sure you bring your holiday cheer and be ready to have a ball! There will be treats for the pups and eggnog** and cookies for their human companions!

Special treat for anyone who makes a donation (pet food, toys, supplies, monetary) to help local shelters keep our furry friends who are less fortunate fed, warm and happy over the holidays.

Don't forget to bring updated vaccines as necessary: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordetella.

See you all soon!

Love & Mistletoe
The Best Friends Elves

*canine games include "Best kiss under the mistletoe", "Wreath toss", "Candy Cane Tug-o-War"
**or apple cider!
item.name: Yankee Swap Meet Up
